EPSBalance

The type of balancing used for non-Hermitian problems

Synopsis

typedef enum { EPS_BALANCE_NONE,
               EPS_BALANCE_ONESIDE,
               EPS_BALANCE_TWOSIDE,
               EPS_BALANCE_USER } EPSBalance;

See Also
